high_descs: pick up the candle from the cupboard under the sink
move up to the side of the sink
place the candle at the side of the sink
anns.task_desc: place a candle at the side of the sink

high_descs: Move left then straight to the cupboard under the left sink
Open the cupboard, remove the green candle inside then shut the cupboard
Move to face the counter top between the two sinks
Place the candle stick on top of the counter between the two bathroom sinks
anns.task_desc: Move a candle to the bathroom counter

high_descs: Turn left and walk forward to the sink on the left.
Take out the candle from the cabinet on the right below the sink, then close the cabinet.
Turn right and walk forward very slightly, then turn left towards the counter top.
Put the candle on the front of the counter, in between the two sinks.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle from a cabinet to a counter.
